MSG_SCREEN_000: The Transmission Unit seems to be functioning.
MSG_SCREEN_001: The main monitors lit up. It looks like two sub-power modules need to be activated.
MSG_DOOR_000: The door is shut tight! Restore power to get it open.
MSG_BATTERY_000: The switch is glowing green. The sub-power seems to have started.
REC_POINT_NOC_01_02:
̄A control system of auxiliary recovery circuits that has been directly integrated into the Power Plant's security system.ā
The electrical grid for the city is solely managed by this Control Panel device.
REC_POINT_NOC_02_02:
̄A power supply, made possible through the use of a large battery.
Designed for disaster recovery, during a power failure.
REC_POINT_NOC_03_02: ̄A mechanical Disaster Prevention shutter. It would likely be operational if power were to be restored to the city.
NPC_ACE_MSG_020: ́Alright-alright! You got it! Now, head on through!
NPC_ACE_MSG_010:
́How 'bout that, ȁ!
Looks like ya found somethin' good!
ā
Hmm... that looks like some good data to me!
Send that on over, and I'll give it a look!
REC_RA_MONS_MES:
̄It has been infected by the Insurgent Demon.
It has an incredibly large amount of power.
